sentences.english: Bei Jing X. T. W. Y. Investment & Consnltant Co. , Ltd.

sentences.english: But his son, Sir Galahad, did.
sentences.chinese: 但这一伟业由他的儿子加拉哈德完成了。

sentences.english: Ambition and enthusiasm is great auxiliary ji.
sentences.chinese: 壮志与热情是伟业的辅冀。

sentences.english: Harmony rallys strength and leads to great successes.
sentences.chinese: 和谐凝聚力量，和谐成就伟业。

sentences.english: "The world expects great things from Turkey, " he wrote in an essay for Foreign Policy .
sentences.chinese: 全世界都在期待土耳其最终成就丰功伟业。

sentences.english: In 2006, Albert Hengfeng science and technology has leapt to a new level.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，恒丰伟业科技事业跃上了一个新的台阶。

sentences.english: For the Guggenheim Mr. Gehry was enlisted to replicate his success in Bilbao, Spain.
sentences.chinese: 盖瑞被请来重现他在西班牙毕尔包古根汉立下的伟业。

sentences.english: Rome was not built in a day!
sentences.chinese: 罗马城非朝夕建成，伟业非一日之功。

sentences.english: The great love and great achievements involve great risk.
sentences.chinese: 所有浓烈的爱情和丰功伟业一样蕴含著巨大的风险。

sentences.english: Let's creat a spectacular Lantian enterprise together with the old& new clients.
sentences.chinese: 让我们与新老客户一起共创辉煌兰天伟业。

sentences.english: Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
sentences.chinese: 要考虑到，浓情烈爱与丰功伟业都包含着极大的风险。

sentences.english: It connects the footbridge over Wai Yip Street with Telford House.
sentences.chinese: 連接横跨伟业街的行人天桥与德福大厦。

sentences.english: Now, Han Sanping copied this mold to "Jian Dang Wei Ye".
sentences.chinese: 现在，韩三平又把这种模式复制到了《建党伟业》中。

sentences.english: Weighing Apparatus Co. , Ltd. Hebei Albert measurement are your ideal choice.
sentences.chinese: 河北伟业计量衡器有限公司是您的理想选择。

sentences.english: To deeds of arms the martial spirit fired.
sentences.chinese: 吟唱战争伟业和尚武精神。

sentences.english: One can make great achievement in that he does but not he knows.
sentences.chinese: 人生伟业的建立，不在能知，乃在能行。
